010-02794-02.pvName: Reactor™ 40 Mechanical/Retrofit/Solenoid Corepack With GHC™ 50 Autopilot Instrument

seo.title: Garmin Reactor™ 40 Mechanical/Retrofit/Solenoid Corepack with GHC™ 50
seo.ogDescription: Reactor 40 Mechanical/Retrofit/Solenoid Corepack is a boat autopilot designed for powerboats & sailboats featuring corepack compatibility, & simple calibration.

overviewTab.title: Overview

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
• Reactor 40 CCU (Course Computer Unit)
  • GHC™ 50 helm control display
  • NMEA 2000® drop cables (2 metres)
  • NMEA 2000 T-connectors
  • Buzzer
  • Male and female terminators
  • Interconnect cable
  • ECU (Electronic control unit)
  • ECU (Electronic Control Unit) power cable
  • Documentation

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
Buzzer/Alarm Specifications

  • Dimensions (L x Diameter): 29/32" x 1" (23 mm x 25 mm)
  • Weight: 2.4 oz (68 g)
  • Temperature range: from 5°F to 131°F (from -15°C to 55°C)
  • Cable length: 10 ft (3.0 m)
  • CCU dimensions: 4.3" x 4.4" x 1.9" (10.9 x 11.2 x 4.8 cm)
  • ECU dimensions: 6.6" x 4.6" x 2.1" (16.8 x 11.7 x 5.3 cm)
  • Supply voltage: 10 V to 30 V
  • Operating temperature: -15° C to 60 C° (5° F to 140° F)
  • Maximum sustained motor current: 15A
  • Maximum instantaneous motor current: 40A
  • Maximum clutch current: 2.5A (for drives requiring higher current than 2.5A, a relay needs to be added to the clutch circuit)

GHC 50 Specifications
